entry.title: first
entry.content:
1 论文列表

1、Z. Yang, W. Lu, Z. Yao and B. Zhang, “Neuroadaptive backstepping tracking control of robotic manipulators considering actuator dynamics,” The 27th Chinese Control and Decision Conference (2015 CCDC), 2015, pp. 465-470, doi: 10.1109/CCDC.2015.7161737.

考虑执行器动力学的机器人神经自适应反步跟踪控制

2、Hanlei Wang, Yongchun Xie,Adaptive inverse dynamics control of robots with uncertain kinematics and dynamics,Automatica,Volume 45, Issue 9,2009,Pages 2114-2119,ISSN 0005-1098,https://doi.org/10.1016/j.automatica.2009.05.011.(https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0005109809002556)

具有不确定的运动学和动力学机器人的自适应反动力学控制

3、D. T. Tran, D. X. Ba and K. K. Ahn, “Adaptive Backstepping Sliding Mode Control for Equilibrium Position Tracking of an Electrohydraulic Elastic Manipulator,” in IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics, vol. 67, no. 5, pp. 3860-3869, May 2020, doi: 10.1109/TIE.2019.2918475.

电液弹性机械臂平衡位置跟踪的自适应反步滑模控制

4、S. Morinaga and K. Kosuge, “Collision detection system for manipulator based on adaptive impedance control law,” 2003 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (Cat. No.03CH37422), 2003, pp. 1080-1085 vol.1, doi: 10.1109/ROBOT.2003.1241736.

基于自适应阻抗控制律的机械臂碰撞检测系统

5、Kee-Ho Yu, Yoshinobu Shito, Hikaru Inooka,Position control of an underactuated manipulator using joint friction,International Journal of Non-Linear Mechanics,

Volume 33, Issue 4,1998,Pages 607-614,ISSN 0020-7462,

https://doi.org/10.1016/S0020-7462(97)00035-8.

(https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0020746297000358)

基于关节摩擦的欠驱动机械手位置控制

6、Z. Xie, L. Jin, X. Luo, S. Li and X. Xiao, “A Data-Driven Cyclic-Motion Generation Scheme for Kinematic Control of Redundant Manipulators,” in IEEE Transactions on Control Systems Technology, vol. 29, no. 1, pp. 53-63, Jan. 2021, doi: 10.1109/TCST.2019.2963017.

数据驱动的循环运动生成运动控制方案冗余度机械手的设计

7、W. He, H. Huang and S. S. Ge, “Adaptive Neural Network Control of a Robotic Manipulator With Time-Varying Output Constraints,” in IEEE Transactions on Cybernetics, vol. 47, no. 10, pp. 3136-3147, Oct. 2017, doi: 10.1109/TCYB.2017.2711961.

时变输出约束机器人的自适应神经网络控制

8、C. Yang, G. Peng, L. Cheng, J. Na and Z. Li, “Force Sensorless Admittance Control for Teleoperation of Uncertain Robot Manipulator Using Neural Networks,” in IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems, vol. 51, no. 5, pp. 3282-3292, May 2021, doi: 10.1109/TSMC.2019.2920870.

基于神经网络的不确定机械手遥操作无力传感器导纳控制

9、Q. Guo, Y. Zhang, B. G. Celler and S. W. Su, “Backstepping Control of Electro-Hydraulic System Based on Extended-State-Observer With Plant Dynamics Largely Unknown,” in IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics, vol. 63, no. 11, pp. 6909-6920, Nov. 2016, doi: 10.1109/TIE.2016.2585080.

10、M. Van, M. Mavrovouniotis and S. S. Ge, “An Adaptive Backstepping Nonsingular Fast Terminal Sliding Mode Control for Robust Fault Tolerant Control of Robot Manipulators,” in IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems, vol. 49, no. 7, pp. 1448-1458, July 2019, doi: 10.1109/TSMC.2017.2782246.

机器人鲁棒容错控制的自适应反步非奇异快速终端滑模控制

11、张世轩,王琬琪,徐志刚,杜木雄.多关节套索驱动机械臂的自适应滑模鲁棒控制[J].组合机床与自动化加工技术,2022(02):63-67.DOI:10.13462/j.cnki.mmtamt.2022.02.015.

12、王泰华,马彬彬,李亚飞.基于神经网络自适应算法的机械臂位置/力控制[J].电动工具,2022(01):14-18.DOI:10.16629/j.cnki.1674-2796.2022.01.003.

13、陈正升,王雪松,程玉虎.考虑扰动与输入饱和的机械臂连续非奇异快速终端滑模控制[J].控制与决策,2022,37(04):903-912.DOI:10.13195/j.kzyjc.2020.1335.

14、于欣波,贺威,薛程谦,孙永坤,孙长银.基于扰动观测器的机器人自适应神经网络跟踪控制研究[J].自动化学报,2019,45(07):1307-1324.DOI:10.16383/j.aas.c180222.

15、朱萌,孟婥,张豪,孙以泽.基于ROS的6自由度机械臂运动轨迹规划[J].组合机床与自动化加工技术,2021(04):1-3+9.DOI:10.13462/j.cnki.mmtamt.2021.04.001.

16、李岩,柴媛媛,刘克平.一类机械臂指数加速迭代学习控制方法[J].科学技术与工程,2020,20(31):12904-12910.

17、Yan Wang and Yongling Fu, “Fuzzy Adaptive Iterative Learning Control Algorithm,” 2006 6th World Congress on Intelligent Control and Automation, 2006, pp. 3719-3723, doi: 10.1109/WCICA.2006.1713065.

数据驱动的自适应迭代学习预测控制

18、S. Zhang, Y. Hui and R. Chi, “Data-driven Adaptive Iterative Learning Control Based on a Local Dynamic Linearization,” 2018 IEEE 7th Data Driven Control and Learning Systems Conference (DDCLS), 2018, pp. 184-188, doi: 10.1109/DDCLS.2018.8516008.

基于局部动态线性化的数据驱动自适应迭代学习控制

19、A. Madady and H. Reza-Alikhani, “Adaptive PI type iterative learning control,” 2010 5th IEEE International Conference Intelligent Systems, 2010, pp. 37-42, doi: 10.1109/IS.2010.5548330.

自适应PI型迭代学习控制

20、Z. Cheng and Z. Zhuo, “Adaptive Iterative Learning Trajectory Tracking Control of SCARA Robot,” 2021 IEEE 4th Advanced Information Management, Communicates, Electronic and Automation Control Conference (IMCEC), 2021, pp. 910-914, doi: 10.1109/IMCEC51613.2021.9482360.

SCARA机器人自适应迭代学习轨迹跟踪控制

21、Y. Sun and J. Li, “Adaptive iterative learning control via continuous sliding-mode technique with uncertainties,” 2016 Chinese Control and Decision Conference (CCDC), 2016, pp. 473-478, doi: 10.1109/CCDC.2016.7531031.

具有不确定性的连续滑模技术自适应迭代学习控制

22、L. Chen and M. Sun, “Barrier Lyapunov function-based fuzzy adaptive iterative learning control,” The 27th Chinese Control and Decision Conference (2015 CCDC), 2015, pp. 2877-2882, doi: 10.1109/CCDC.2015.7162417.

基于障碍李雅普诺夫函数的模糊自适应迭代学习控制

23、R. Chi, X. Liu, Z. Hou and C. -J. Chien, “A novel adaptive iterative learning control via data-driven approach,” 2016 35th Chinese Control Conference (CCC), 2016, pp. 3147-3151, doi: 10.1109/ChiCC.2016.7553842.

一种基于数据驱动方法的新型自适应迭代学习控制

24、Q. Quan, W. Xinhua and C. Kaiyuan, “Higher-order Adaptive Iterative Control for Uncertain Robot Manipulators,” 2007 Chinese Control Conference, 2007, pp. 825-829, doi: 10.1109/CHICC.2006.4347468.

不确定机器人机械手的高阶自适应迭代控制

25、李兴. 基于改进型自抗扰控制的多自由度机械臂控制系统研究[D].安徽工程大学,2021.DOI:10.27763/d.cnki.gahgc.2021.000167.

26、易善超. 基于高阶滑模的机械臂轨迹跟踪控制[D].东南大学,2019.DOI:10.27014/d.cnki.gdnau.2019.002124.

27、周振. 基于滑模变结构的机械臂轨迹跟踪控制方法研究[D].青岛大学,2021.DOI:10.27262/d.cnki.gqdau.2021.002206.

28、徐贵. 基于滑模的机械臂轨迹跟踪控制研究[D].东南大学,2020.DOI:10.27014/d.cnki.gdnau.2020.001433.

29、吴绍华. 基于终端滑模控制的机械臂轨迹跟踪[D].天津大学,2018.DOI:10.27356/d.cnki.gtjdu.2018.000890.

30、夏炎. 多关节机械臂轨迹规划和轨迹跟踪控制研究[D].哈尔滨工业大学,2017.

31、刘海亭. 基于滑模变结构控制的机械臂轨迹跟踪[D].天津大学,2018.

32、L. Zhang, Z. Chen, Z. Li, C. -Y. Su and Z. Xiao, “Adaptive neural network control for uncertain MIMO robotic systems with time-varying delay and unknown backlash-like hysteresis,” 2015 IEEE International Conference on Information and Automation, 2015, pp. 1827-1832, doi: 10.1109/ICInfA.2015.7279585.

具有时变延迟和未知类反冲滞后的不确定多输入多输出机器人系统的自适应神经网络控制（有工程文件）

33、王新达,韩宝玲,陈禹含,郑凯林.一种多关节机械臂运动过程中的碰撞检测方法[J].科学技术与工程,2019,19(14):218-223.

34、C. Yang, Y. Jiang, W. He, J. Na, Z. Li and B. Xu, “Adaptive Parameter Estimation and Control Design for Robot Manipulators With Finite-Time Convergence,” in IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics, vol. 65, no. 10, pp. 8112-8123, Oct. 2018, doi: 10.1109/TIE.2018.2803773.

具有有限时间收敛性的机器人机械手自适应参数估计与控制设计

2 论文阅读笔记

Adaptive Neural Network Control of a Robotic Manipulator With Time-V arying Output Constraints

带时变输出约束的机械臂自适应神经网络控制

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
